page.title: 19TWO CHILDREN'S VIEWS
page.content:
SVEN: He is a nine year old boy. His favourite school lessons are mathematics, science and history. He dislikes English and cricket.
He enjoyed watching television, particularly two programmes called 'The A Team' and 'Magnum. ' When on holiday from school he enjoyed going to the Lake District, and spending money! {______________________________________
ANDREW: He is a nine year old boy. His favourite lessons at school are English and Maths. He likes watching television and playing football.
His favourite Television programme is Coronation Street.
